Articles.Content: I installed the bluedog design bureau mod, then my fps went crazy. Like, when i move the camera, it dosent happen on screen for a good amount of time. Is there a fix?

BDB is a very large mod and it could be that your PC is underpowered to handle it smoothly.

Or you may have mis-installed something and it is spamming messages to your log file causing the game to slow down.

We'd need to see your log files to know what your problem is:
